China's Xi Jinping summons 'new productive forces', but old questions lingerFacing its deepest economic challenges in years, China's leadership has tasked ministries and local governments with implementing a new mantra from President Xi Jinping: unleash "new productive forces". Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:03:44 GMT H3HIFQF3M5JIVEGZOTAHD244BI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-xi-summons-new-productive-forces-old-questions-linger-economy-2024-03-05/James Pomfret, Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang世界中国
Morning Bid: Risk rally comes to shuddering haltA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:49:12 GMT AJCHC7ELZZJM5AXFXAFLJ4SEQM https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-pix-2024-03-05/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
Senator Rubio seeks stiffer tariff to stop China 'flooding US auto markets'Republican U.S. Senator Marco Rubio on Tuesday proposed sharply boosting tariffs on Chinese vehicle imports by $20,000 to stop the country "from flooding U.S. auto markets," Washington's latest effort to protect American automakers and auto workers. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:33:32 GMT YDQGRK4ITFJXHFMIJ242MCPLHY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/senator-rubio-seeks-stiffer-tariff-stop-china-flooding-us-auto-markets-2024-03-05/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
EU set to allow possible retroactive tariffs for Chinese EVsThe European Commission plans to start customs registration of Chinese electric vehicle (EV) imports, meaning they could be hit by tariffs from that point if the EU's trade investigation later concludes that they are receiving unfair subsidies. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:20:01 GMT OQ4RRB2F2VJQBLKTXXQFTJSC3I https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/eu-set-allow-possible-retroactive-tariffs-chinese-evs-2024-03-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
BYD spearheads Chinese electric car push in Australia, a friendlier marketBYD and other Chinese automakers are bringing new electric car models in droves to Australia, a market where they haven't faced trade barriers and sales have surged due to EV subsidies and tax benefits as well as high gasoline prices. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:05:39 GMT OV6FYQO2QFMTHL2QSY5HX3KBME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/byd-spearheads-chinese-electric-car-push-australia-friendlier-market-2024-03-05/Stella Qiu商业汽车与交通
Brembo "plays it by ear" with cagey 2024 sales forecastItaly's Brembo offered a cautious outlook on Tuesday, guiding for mid-single digit revenue growth this year, in line with its performance for 2023, as geopolitical and commercial tensions allow limited visibility on future business prospects. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 17:18:14 GMT KXO34QRYKFMJJAVCIIZLC23YQE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/brembo-plays-it-by-ear-with-cagey-2024-sales-forecast-2024-03-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
